_aChangeLog.text: Added new game [KZ COLOURS]
Added new game [CRAZY FORKLIFT]
Removed teleports between cells and race/lowgrav climb
Made buttons all make a noise (excluding secret buttons)
Added lots of secrets to the new room ;)
Reworked old disco/rave/showers/gmanfucksthearmoury secret
Added 3 new optional kz challenges over pool [HighDive, Surf, & Crates]
Tweaked lighting in pool [god rays now shorter and dont clip into the ceiling]
Made water in pool more visible from outside and less visible from inside (of the water).
Added music to kz colours & crazy forklift
Fixed a boosted platform in bhop which was near impossible on hard difficulty
Added corridors connecting the back end of shower to the newly created pool extension room.
Added colours to the goals in football to help command Ts more easily
Fixed bugged audio in drop down
Added Drop Down
Reworked Kitchen Layout/Secrets
Removed doors leading into LowGrav/Race room
Added a touch trigger door to the start of low grav to prevent people falling down accidently
Added start sign above the door to low grav climb
Changed recall for low grav / race to also recall CT to the upper platform
Changed recall location for terrorists playing low grav / race to the start of race to prevent Ts escaping
Fixed boosters on Bhop being inconsistent
Added new platform connecting to what was previously the pillar outside of big cage
Added teleporter from the new platform into Low Grav / Race room
Fixed cell 1 vent (tp to ak room)
Moved myself
Added sound for first winner of drop down
Fixed nodraw issues in the skybox (visible nodraw)

_sText:
My edit of the classic, jb_electric_razor, with all new games and secrets. (Original)

Games:
- Surf
- Bhop
- Climb (Easy, Medium, Hard, Pro)
- Lasers (IDFK by Maradox)
- Football
- Dodge Course
- Ski-Ball 
- Hide and Seek 
- HNS Chase
- Extreme Climb
- Low Grav Climb
- KZ Race (1v1)
- Pool (LJ Room)
- Showers (Diving Board)
- Football
